source.sqlReaderQuery:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT  
      [ï»¿Customer_Header_Reference] as [Customer Header Reference]
      ,[Address_Reference]
      --,[Phone_Country_Code]
      --,[Phone_Extension]
      ,[Contact_Reference]
      ,[Contact_Point Reference]
      ,[Contact_First_Name]
      ,[Contact_Last_Name]
      ,[Contact Point_Type]
      ,[Area_Code]
      ,[Telephone_Number]
	  ,CASE COALESCE([Phone_Extension],'')  when ''  then '' else [Phone_Extension] end as [Phone_Extension]
      ,[EMAIL_Address]
      ,[Invoice_Delivery_Method]
       ,[Operating_Unit_Name]
  FROM [customer].[CustomerBillToContacts]

/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT  
      [ï»¿Customer_Header_Reference] as [Customer Header Reference]
      ,[Address_Reference]
      ,[Contact_Point_Type]
      ,[Contact_Point_Status]
      ,[Primary_Flag]
      ,[Contact_Point_Purpose]
      ,[Phone_Country_Code]
      ,[Phone_Area_Code]
      ,[Phone_Number]
        ,CASE COALESCE([Phone_Extension],'')  when ''  then '' else [Phone_Extension] end as [Phone_Extension]
      ,[Phone_Line_Type]
      ,[Email_Address]
      ,[Email_Format]
	 , [Operating_Unit_Name]
  FROM [customer].[CustomerContactPoints]

/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT  [Customer_Name]
      ,[Customer_Party_Reference_Number]
      ,[Customer_Account_Reference_Number]
      ,[Customer_Type]
      ,[Customer_Profile]
      ,'' as [Payment_Method_Name]
      ,'' as [Payment_Method_Primary_Flag]
      ,[Global_Customer_Flag]
      ,'' as [Origin_(AR)]
      ,'' as [Primary_ID_Type]
      ,'' as [Primary_ID_Validation_Digit]
      ,'' as [Taxpayer_ID]
      ,'' as [Fiscal_Classification_Type_Code]
      ,'' as [Fiscal_Classification_Code]
      ,'' as [Effective_Date_From]
      ,'' as [Document_Type_(CO)]
      ,'' as [Taxpayer_ID_(CO)]
      , '' as [Nature_(CO)]
      ,'' as [Regimen_(CO)]
      ,'' as [Special_Customer_Flag]
      ,[Operating_Unit_Name]
      ,'' as [Customer_Class_Code]
      ,[Payment_Term_Name]
      ,'' as [Order_Number_of_the_Cedula_(GT)]
      ,'' as [Register_Number_of_the_Cedula_(GT)]
      ,'' as [Document_Type_(SV)]
      ,'' as [Contributor_Registry_Number_(SV)]
      ,'' as [Person_Category_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Person_Type_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Document_Type_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Document_Number_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Last_Name_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Second_Last_Name_(PE)]
      ,'' as [First_Name_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Middle_Name_(PE)]
      ,'' as [Origin]
      ,'' as [Nature]
      ,'' as [Document_Type_(UY)]
      ,'' as [Perception_Agent_(PE)]
  FROM [customer].[header]
